commentary.comment: The first half has started.

Bernardo Silva (Monaco) unleashes a promising shot towards the right side of the goal after his wonderful solo run, but Benjamin Lecomte thwarts the effort with a fabulous save. The score remains the same.

A good lofted pass from Bernardo Silva finds Yannick Carrasco (Monaco) on the edge of the area. He collects the ball and rips in a wonderful shot which ends up low in the middle of the goal. The score is now 0:1.
Today's referee Tony Chapron rightly decides to book Didier Ndong (Lorient) for his harsh tackle.
Anthony Martial (Monaco) receives a lofted pass in the goal area and unleashes a dangerous header which sails a few inches over the bar!
Layvin Kurzawa (Monaco) meets a cross and produces a header towards the right side of the goal, but one of the defending players blocks the effort.
Tony Chapron shows the yellow card to Joao Moutinho (Monaco) for a heavy challenge.
The match has reached half-time.
The game restarts for the second half.
The game is interrupted, a clear handball by Lamine Kone (Lorient). The referee blows his whistle and awards Monaco a penalty after chaos inside the box.
Anthony Martial (Monaco) is heading towards the penalty spot to take it.

Anthony Martial (Monaco) wastes a huge opportunity to score from the penalty spot. He attempts to slot into the left side of the target, but Benjamin Lecomte pulls off a superb save. The ball goes out of play and Monaco have been awarded a corner kick.
The game has come to an end for Romain Philippoteaux. He has contributed as much as he could today. He will be replaced by the fresh legs of Vincent Le Goff (Lorient).
Mehdi Mostefa (Lorient) blows an opportunity as he sends a rebound from just outside of the box narrowly wide of the left post.
Yannick Carrasco (Monaco) is awarded a yellow card for his tackle. He doesn't seem to agree with the decision, but Tony Chapron ignores the protests.

What an amazing save by Benjamin Lecomte! Anthony Martial (Monaco) swirls around the defenders and attempts to beat the keeper with a close-range shot low towards the middle of the target, but fails. The referee blows his whistle, Monaco are awarded a corner kick.
The foul by Jordan Ayew (Lorient) is worthy of a card and a yellow is duly shown by Tony Chapron.
The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and Gianni Bruno (Lorient) replaces Walid Mesloub.
Here is a change. Anthony Martial is going off and Leonardo Jardim gives the last tactical orders to Valere Germain (Monaco).
It's time for a substitution. Fabien Audard (Lorient) comes on in place of Benjamin Lecomte.
Leonardo Jardim has decided to make a change. Nabil Dirar (Monaco) replaces Yannick Carrasco.
The game is interrupted. Danijel Subasic (Monaco) is given a yellow card. He has to be more careful now.
Gooal! No wait, it's been ruled out for offside. Nabil Dirar (Monaco) disagrees, but the linesman is sure about his call.
The referee blows his whistle for the final time to end this match.
Today's match has just started, enjoy the game!
Goal! Dimitri Payet (Marseille) pounced on a loose ball inside the box and beats the goalkeeper with a shot into the bottom left corner. He makes it 1:0.
The game is interrupted.
What a huge chance for Giovanni Sio (Bastia). He collects a precise pass inside the box and slices a shot that goes a whisker wide of the left post.
Ruddy Buquet shows the yellow card to Drissa Diakite (Bastia) for a heavy challenge. Marseille win a free kick and will be able to apply some pressure on the opposition goal.
It's an own goal! Aleksander Djiku (Bastia) scores into his own net!
That is it for the first half after the referee blows his whistle and the players head to their respective dressing rooms.
The game is interrupted.
Everything seems to be alright after the game was interrupted, the referee blows his whistle and the match can continue.
Referee Ruddy Buquet blows his whistle to start the second half.
It will be a substitution. Lucas Ocampos (Marseille) is ready to enter the pitch as Florian Thauvin walks off.
Marcelo Bielsa has decided to introduce fresh legs, with Michy Batshuayi (Marseille) replacing Andre-Pierre Gignac.
Giovanni Sio comes off the pitch to be replaced by Silva Brandao (Bastia).
Today's referee Ruddy Buquet rightly decides to book Nicolas N'Koulou (Marseille) for his harsh tackle. Bastia win a free kick.
Ghislain Printant has decided to substitute Gael Danic and he is replaced by Djibril Cisse (Bastia).
The referee signals that it is time for a substitution and Baptiste Aloe (Marseille) is coming onto the pitch as Dimitri Payet cannot continue after picking up an injury.

Lucas Ocampos (Marseille) finishes his beautiful individual effort with a superb strike from inside the box. Jean-Louis Leca is just a bystander as the ball flies into the bottom left corner. The score is 3:0.
Here's the change. Julian Palmieri leaves the pitch and Francois Kamano (Bastia) comes on as a substitute.
That's it for today, Ruddy Buquet has blown his whistle and the game is over.
The match has just started.
Javier Pastore (Paris SG) gets to the rebound just outside the box, but his attempt is blocked by one of the defending players.

Kossi Agassa pulls off a great save to deny Edinson Cavani (Paris SG), who makes himself some space inside the box and unleashes a quick low drive to the bottom left corner. Paris SG force their opponents to concede a corner.
A yellow card for a tackle by Mohamed Fofana (Reims). Clement Turpin doesn't hesitate at all to make this decision. Paris SG win a free kick. It's a promising situation for a direct shot.
Thiago Silva slides a brilliant pass into Javier Pastore (Paris SG), but his shot from inside the box goes a whisker over the crossbar.
David N'Gog (Reims) has a sight of goal, fires a shot in from distance towards the right post and forces a good save out of Nicolas Douchez. Reims will take a corner kick.

Goal! Marco Verratti displays great vision and sends a pass to Edinson Cavani (Paris SG), who shows brilliant composure inside the box to bury the ball from close range in the back of the net. The score is 1:0.
Javier Pastore (Paris SG) is furious with himself as he misses a golden opportunity from inside the six-yard box. He sends a rebound a few inches wide of the left post.
The referee gives a yellow card to Mads Albaek (Reims).

Gregory van der Wiel (Paris SG) receives a quality pass and unleashes a rocket of a shot from distance, but his amazing effort goes just over the crossbar. The goalkeeper probably wouldn't have saved this one.
Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) does well to meet a cross from Javier Pastore, but he directs his shot just wide of the left post.
GOAL! Superb work from Lucas, who plays a vital role in the build-up. He squares it to Adrien Rabiot (Paris SG), who beats Kossi Agassa with a brilliant shot into the left side of the net. 2:0.
The first half of today's match has just finished.
The half-time break is over and the second half is about to start.
Franck Signorino launches a beautiful lofted cross into the box, where Aissa Mandi (Reims) rises high to head the ball into the right side of the goal and beyond the goalkeeper. 2:0.

Nicolas Douchez can hear the fans clapping for his superb goalkeeping after he magnificently stops the close-range effort from Gaetan Charbonnier (Reims). The ball would have probably ended up low inside the middle of the net. The ball is out of play. Reims will have a chance to score from a corner.
Laurent Blanc is forced to make an unplanned substitution as Thiago Silva suffers an injury and David Luiz (Paris SG) comes on.
Olivier Guegan has decided to substitute David N'Gog and he is replaced by Grejohn Kyei (Reims).
The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and Mads Albaek departs the field of play to be replaced by Omenuke Mfulu (Reims).
It's time for a substitution. That's the last involvement from Thiago Motta as he is replaced by Yohan Cabaye (Paris SG).
Diego (Reims) spurned a good chance! He gets a shot away from inside the penalty box, but it goes just over the bar.
Olivier Guegan has decided to introduce fresh legs, with Odair Fortes (Reims) replacing Gaetan Charbonnier.
The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and Lucas trots off the pitch and is replaced by Ezequiel Lavezzi (Paris SG).
Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) receives a brilliant pass inside the box from Ezequiel Lavezzi, and he beats the goalkeeper with a low accurate shot into the middle of the goal. He makes it 3:1.
Omenuke Mfulu finds Grejohn Kyei (Reims) with a sweet pass inside the penalty box, who then smashes the ball inside the right post. What a clinical finish to make it 3:2.
That's all for today as the game is over.
The first half has just begun.
The referee blows his whistle for half-time, bringing to a close the first 45 minutes of the match.
The second half gets underway.
The referee allows time for a substitution. Mohamed Yattara will be replaced by Clinton N'Jie (Lyon).
Hubert Fournier has decided to substitute Steed Malbranque and he is replaced by Gueida Fofana (Lyon).
Jordan Ferri goes off the pitch and Yassine Benzia (Lyon) comes on.
Here's the change. Kamil Grosicki leaves the pitch and Pedro Henrique (Rennes) comes on as a substitute.
Philippe Montanier prepares a substitution. Ola Toivonen is replaced by Habibou Habib (Rennes).
Clinton N'Jie (Lyon) makes a great solo run and pulls the trigger from inside the box, beating Benoit Costil with a strike into the bottom right corner. He makes it 0:1.
The referee signals that it is time for a substitution and Vincent Pajot (Rennes) will replace Benjamin Andre.
That's the end of the match.
The first half has just begun.

Dimitri Payet (Marseille) wastes an opportunity. He finds himself in acres of space and fires in a terrific shot from long range low towards the middle of the target, but the goalkeeper makes a brilliant save and stops this one!
Goal! The rebound fell to Andre-Pierre Gignac (Marseille) and he fired home from close range. The score is 0:1.

Rony Lopes (Lille) was trying to get to the ball but clattered into the legs of the opponent as well. Tony Chapron blows his whistle for an infringement. Marseille earn a free kick which could lead to a goal-scoring opportunity.
Simon Kjaer (Lille) meets a cross and produces a header towards the right side of the goal, but one of the defending players blocks the effort.
Gooal! Dimitri Payet takes over corner duties. Rod Fanni (Marseille) gets his head on the ball from the corner and puts it into the right side of the net. 0:2.
Florent Balmont (Lille) receives a yellow card for a nasty tackle.
CHANCE! Andre-Pierre Gignac (Marseille) fires just wide of the left post from inside the box after running onto a splendid pass from Rod Fanni.
Gianelli Imbula (Marseille) has to be very careful for the rest of the match after receiving a yellow card from the referee for a bad tackle on an opponent.
Yellow card. Sebastien Corchia (Lille) goes into the book for a bad tackle on his opponent.
The first half of today's match has just finished.
Referee Tony Chapron blows his whistle to start the second half.
Steve Mandanda pulls off a great save to deny Rony Lopes (Lille) who, makes himself some space inside the box and unleashes a quick low drive towards the middle of the goal.
The manager has decided to make a substitution and Rony Lopes walks off the pitch to be replaced by Ryan Mendes (Lille).
Rene Girard is forced to make a change. Simon Kjaer is unable to continue due to injury, Benjamin Pavard (Lille) comes on.
Lovely cross from Dimitri Payet to find Nicolas N'Koulou (Marseille) deep in the box, but he steers his header well over the bar.
Romain Alessandrini (Marseille) has tested the patience of referee Tony Chapron and goes into the book for a previous late challenge.

Superb finishing from Romain Alessandrini (Marseille). Andre Ayew plays a fantastic through ball and finds Romain Alessandrini (Marseille), who reacts quickly to get in front of the goal and fire a close-range shot past the goalkeeper. It's 0:2.

Goal! Gianelli Imbula produces a great pass that finds Andre Ayew (Marseille) inside the penalty area, who takes advantage of the situation to rifle a shot past the goalkeeper and into the back of the net. 0:2.
Substitution. Florian Thauvin (Marseille) in, Romain Alessandrini out.
Benjamin Mendy (Marseille) takes his opponent down and receives a yellow card from the referee. Another situation results in a direct free kick for Lille.
We are about to witness a subsitution. Michy Batshuayi (Marseille) for Andre-Pierre Gignac.
Substitution. Dimitri Payet leaves the pitch and is replaced by Lucas Ocampos (Marseille).
Ryan Mendes has picked up an injury and is replaced by Adama Traore (Lille).
That's it for today, Tony Chapron has blown his whistle and the game is over.
The referee blows his whistle and we are underway.
Goal 0:1! Enzo Crivelli (Bordeaux) taps home from close range after the rebound fell kindly into his path.
Goal! Jordan Ferri displays great vision and sends a pass to Nabil Fekir (Lyon), who shows brilliant composure inside the box to bury the ball into the bottom right corner. The score is 1:1.
Jaroslav Plasil (Bordeaux) is awarded a yellow card for his tackle. He doesn't seem to agree with the decision, but Benoit Millot ignores the protests.
Diego Rolan (Bordeaux) sees a yellow card from Benoit Millot after he sent one of the opposing players to the ground.
Benoit Millot shows a yellow card to Clement Chantome (Bordeaux) for a tough tackle.
Jordan Ferri (Lyon) makes a bad challenge on his opponent and is booked by the referee.

Henri Saivet (Bordeaux) wastes a great scoring opportunity! He receives a precise lofted cross inside the box and sends a quick shot to the bottom right corner, but he can't get the power to direct it past Anthony Lopes, who gets down to save.
The end of the first half.
Referee Benoit Millot blows his whistle to start the second half.
A yellow card for a tackle by Frederic Guilbert (Bordeaux). Benoit Millot doesn't hesitate at all to make this decision.
Alexandre Lacazette (Lyon) amazingly found his way through the defence, but lacked a precise finish as his effort from close range went slightly wide of the right post.
Mohamed Yattara (Lyon) joins the action as a substitute, replacing Steed Malbranque.
The referee signals that it is time for a substitution and Wahbi Khazri (Bordeaux) will replace Enzo Crivelli.
Hubert Fournier has decided to make a change. Gueida Fofana (Lyon) replaces Clement Grenier.
Nabil Fekir (Lyon) fouls his opponent and receives a yellow card from the referee, but he is clearly not happy with the decision.
It will be a substitution. Nicolas Maurice-Belay (Bordeaux) is ready to enter the pitch as Frederic Guilbert walks off.
Hubert Fournier has decided to substitute Jordan Ferri and he is replaced by Arnold Mvuemba (Lyon).
Maxime Gonalons (Lyon) rises above the defence to meet a cross from the corner. His timing is good, but he directs his header just a few inches wide of the right post.
It is time for a substitution. Isaac Kiese Thelin (Bordeaux) is on for Diego Rolan.
The referee blows his whistle for the final time to end this match.
The match has just started.
takes a great touch after receiving a pass inside the box. He immediately unleashes a low shot to the middle of the goal, but the keeper pulls off a decent save!
Juan Falcon (Metz) does his best to latch onto a cross into the box, but he can't get to the ball.
Fakhreddine Ben Youssef (Metz) receives a lofted pass in the goal area and unleashes a dangerous header which sails narrowly wide of the left post!
Anthony Martial (Monaco) wriggles into space inside the box with excellent ball control, but his effort on goal is well blocked. The ball is out of play and Monaco manage to earn a corner.
Guirane N'Daw (Metz) sees a yellow card from Amaury Delerue after he sent one of the opposing players to the ground. Metz are awarded a free kick. Let's see what they create from this.
What a chance that is! Layvin Kurzawa (Monaco) displays good awareness near the penalty spot to get on the end of a cross from the free kick, but he steers his header narrowly over the crossbar.
What a big chance! Bernardo Silva (Monaco) picks up an inch-perfect pass inside the box and fires the ball a whisker wide of the right post.
CHANCE! Janis Ikaunieks (Metz) picks up a perfect pass inside the box, makes himself some space for a shot, but his effort goes just over the crossbar.

It's in the back of the net! Superb finishing from Bernardo Silva (Monaco). Joao Moutinho plays a fantastic through ball and finds Bernardo Silva (Monaco), who reacts quickly to get in front of the goalkeeper and fire a close-range shot into the right side of the goal. It's now 1:0.
That is it for the first half after the referee blows his whistle and the players head to their respective dressing rooms.
The players are back out on the pitch following the half-time break and the second half is about to start.
Lovely run from Anthony Martial (Monaco). He finds himself one-on-one with the goalkeeper, lines up a shot but the keeper boldly launched himself to intercept the ball.
Golden chance! Yannick Carrasco (Monaco) meets a cross in the box and finds some space for a shot. He produces an inaccurate effort that goes wide of the left post.
Amaury Delerue shows a yellow card to Janis Ikaunieks (Metz) for a tough tackle.

Layvin Kurzawa (Monaco) drills the free kick effort towards the bottom right corner, but David Oberhauser is well prepared and makes a good block to stop the ball from crossing the goal line. Corner kick. Monaco will have an opportunity.
Substitution. Fakhreddine Ben Youssef makes his way off the pitch and Kevin Lejeune (Metz) comes on as his replacement.
Albert Cartier has decided to make a change. Modibo Maiga (Metz) replaces Juan Falcon.
Substitution. Yannick Carrasco will be replaced by Nabil Dirar (Monaco).

David Oberhauser pulls off a great save to deny Bernardo Silva (Monaco), who makes himself some space inside the box and unleashes a quick shot to the left side of the goal. The referee signals a corner kick to Monaco.
The referee signals a substitution. Valere Germain (Monaco) is brought on as a substitute for Anthony Martial.
Goal! Valere Germain (Monaco) scores after an assist by Bernardo Silva that allowed him to tap in the ball into an empty net. The score is 2:0.
That's all for today as the game is over.
The first half of this match is about to start.
Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) fires a wonderful strike towards goal, but it goes over the bar by a whisker.

It's in the back of the net! Superb finishing from Blaise Matuidi (Paris SG). Adrien Rabiot plays a fantastic through ball and finds Blaise Matuidi (Paris SG), who reacts quickly to get in front of the goalkeeper and fire a close-range shot into the right side of the goal. It's now 0:1.
Serge Aurier feeds the ball through to Ezequiel Lavezzi (Paris SG), who picks up the pass inside the box and quickly sends it into the right side of the goal! The goalkeeper was helpless. 0:1!
Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) makes a good run inside the box to meet a precise cross. He latches on to it and shoots, but the goalkeeper pulls off an excellent save. Paris SG earn a corner.
Rolland Courbis is forced to make an unplanned substitution as Jamel Saihi suffers an injury and Bryan Dabo (Montpellier) comes on.

Mathieu Deplagne slides a pass towards Anthony Mounier (Montpellier) who unleashes a fabulous shot from long range. The ball goes behind the surprised goalkeeper and into the roof of the net. The score is now 1:2.
Hilton Hilton (Montpellier) infringed the rules and goes into the book. Fredy Fautrel pulls out a yellow card.
Javier Pastore (Paris SG) is awarded a yellow card for his behaviour.
The referee blows his whistle for half-time, bringing to a close the first 45 minutes of the match.
The second half gets underway.
Rolland Courbis makes a half-time substitution. Kevin Berigaud (Montpellier) comes on in place of Anthony Mounier.
Fredy Fautrel shows a yellow card to Mathieu Deplagne (Montpellier), who isn't surprised as the tackle was really hard and late.
Adrien Rabiot (Paris SG) sees a yellow card from Fredy Fautrel after he sent one of the opposing players to the ground.
A yellow card for a tackle by Bryan Dabo (Montpellier). Fredy Fautrel doesn't hesitate at all to make this decision.
Yohan Cabaye (Paris SG) receives a yellow card for infringement.
Fredy Fautrel shows a yellow card to Serge Aurier (Paris SG) for a tough tackle.
A substitution has been made. Ezequiel Lavezzi is replaced by Lucas (Paris SG).
It's time for a substitution. Marquinhos (Paris SG) comes on in place of Yohan Cabaye.
Rolland Courbis has decided to substitute Joris Marveaux and he is replaced by Souleymane Camara (Montpellier).

Maxwell (Paris SG) attempts to turn the rebound in from close range. Nevertheless, the goalkeeper pulls off a stunning save and stops the ball from hitting the net. Great goalkeeping. Paris SG will take a corner kick.
Marquinhos (Paris SG) can't expect anything else than a yellow card for his hard tackle. And a yellow it is. Fredy Fautrel didn't think twice about pulling it out of his pocket.
CHANCE! Javier Pastore (Paris SG) fires just over the crossbar from inside the box after running onto a splendid pass from Lucas.
The referee blows for the end of today's match.
The first half has just begun.
What a beauty from just outside the box! Joao Moutinho (Monaco) lashed the ball with incredible pace and power into the bottom left corner.
Joao Moutinho swings the cross over. Andrea Raggi (Monaco) gets his head to it but it goes just wide of the right post.
Anthony Martial (Monaco) picks up a rebound inside the penalty area and sends a shot to the middle of the goal, but is denied by a reflex save from Steve Mandanda.
Romain Alessandrini (Marseille) is unlucky with a goal-bound effort from the edge of the box. A fortuitous save from Danijel Subasic stops the ball from going into the middle of the goal.
The foul by Nicolas N'Koulou (Marseille) is worthy of a card and a yellow is duly shown by Clement Turpin.
Steve Mandanda (Marseille) pulls off a great save to deny , who makes himself some space inside the box and unleashes a quick shot to the right side of the goal.

OFF THE POST! Bernardo Silva (Monaco) drifts into the box to give his teammate support. He receives a fantastic pass and shoots from close range, but it crashes against the right post! It could have been a brilliant goal, unlucky.
There will be nothing more to see in the first half. The whistle blowing of Clement Turpin has ended it.
The players are back out on the pitch following the half-time break and the second half is about to start.
Half-time substitution. Marcelo Bielsa decided to make a change. Mario Lemina is replaced by Rod Fanni (Marseille).
A substitution has been made. Andre-Pierre Gignac is replaced by Michy Batshuayi (Marseille).
Benjamin Mendy (Marseille) finds himself with a great opportunity! He unleashes a shot from the edge of the box, which whizzes just wide of the left post!

Dimitri Payet (Marseille) collects a rebound a long way out and doesn't hesitate to release a goal-bound hammer of a shot. His attempt is precise and towards the middle of the target. It would have ended in the back of the net if it wasn't for Danijel Subasic and his nice save.
The referee allows time for a substitution. Gianelli Imbula will be replaced by Florian Thauvin (Marseille).
Ricardo Carvalho (Monaco) is punished with a yellow card for violating the rules.
Andrea Raggi (Monaco) earns the yellow card.
Yellow card! It's like Jacques-Alaixys Romao (Marseille) was asking for a caution with his behaviour. Clement Turpin agrees and books him.
Substitution. Bernardo Silva makes way for Tiemoue Bakayoko (Monaco).
Problems for Leonardo Jardim as Aymen Abdennour is not able to play anymore. His injury is too serious and Wallace (Monaco) replaces him.
Goal! Romain Alessandrini picks out Andre Ayew (Marseille) with a perfect cross, and he has no problem to nod the ball into an empty net. It's 1:1.
Benjamin Mendy (Marseille) sees a yellow card from Clement Turpin after he sent one of the opposing players to the ground.
The game has come to an end for Anthony Martial. He has contributed as much as he could today. He will be replaced by the fresh legs of Dimitar Berbatov (Monaco).
Goal! Dimitri Payet produces a great pass that finds Romain Alessandrini (Marseille) inside the penalty area, who takes advantage of the situation to rifle a shot into the bottom right corner. 0:1.
The referee checks his watch and blows his whistle to signal the end of this match.
The referee blows his whistle and we are underway.
Lenny Nangis (Caen) receives a yellow card from the referee as expected.
Bangali-Fode Koita (Caen) latches on to a precise cross and hammers the ball goalwards, but it flies just wide of the right post. The ball goes out of play and Lyon will have a goal kick.
N'Golo Kante (Caen) is first to the rebound but his shot is blocked. Wow, what an escape there for the opposition. The ball goes out of play and it will be a corner kick.
Goal! Sloan Privat slips it to Nicolas Benezet (Caen) on the edge of the box and he lashes the ball into the middle of the net. The score is 1:0.
N'Golo Kante passes the ball into the penalty area. Nicolas Benezet (Caen) collects it and quickly sends it into the right side of the goal via the post! The goalkeeper was helpless. 2:0!
The match has reached half-time.
Everything is set for the start of the second half.
Hubert Fournier makes a switch. Mehdi Zeffane (Lyon) is coming on in place of Henri Bedimo at the start of the second period.
Patrice Garande prepares a substitution. Bangali-Fode Koita is replaced by Herve Bazile (Caen).
Substitution. Jordan Ferri makes way for Mohamed Yattara (Lyon).
What was Alexandre Lacazette (Lyon) thinking? He will not get away with that. The referee shows him a yellow card.
Nabil Fekir (Lyon) came close to scoring. He connected with a pass inside the box and perhaps should have done better than direct his shot straight at Remy Vercoutre.
Patrice Garande has decided to make a change. Julien Feret (Caen) replaces Lenny Nangis.
Mohamed Yattara (Lyon) receives a great pass inside the box and misses a golden chance. The goalkeeper pulls off a stunning save. The referee blows his whistle, Lyon are awarded a corner kick.
Hubert Fournier has decided to introduce fresh legs, with Steed Malbranque (Lyon) replacing Bakary Kone.
Substitution. Thomas Lemar (Caen) replaces Nicolas Benezet.
Goal! Thomas Lemar feeds Sloan Privat (Caen), who taps the ball into an empty net. He makes it 3:0.
The referee blows for the end of today's match.
Here we go, today's match is starting right now.
It's in the back of the net! Serge Aurier plays it into the box, and Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) gets on the end of the cross to put it into the bottom left corner. 1:0.
Edinson Cavani slides a brilliant pass into Maxwell (Paris SG), but his shot from inside the box goes a whisker wide of the left post. The ball goes out of play and Guingamp will have a goal kick.

Claudio Beauvue (Guingamp) releases a promising shot from the free kick from around 40 metres out. The ball goes towards the underside of the crossbar, but the goalkeeper makes a decent save and denies him. The ball goes out of play and Guingamp have been awarded a corner kick.

What a great chance for Jeremy Sorbon (Guingamp). He times his jump superbly when he leaps high to meet a precise cross from the corner, directing his towering header inside the right post, but the goalkeeper denies him with a miraculous save.
Zlatan Ibrahimovic (Paris SG) receives a brilliant pass inside the box from Marco Verratti, and beats the goalkeeper with a shot into the roof of the net. He makes it 2:0.

Javier Pastore (Paris SG) dribbles deep into the box and releases a strike towards the right side of the goal, but Jonas Lossl makes a sensational reflex save and punches the ball onto the post. Superb goalkeeping!
This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Zlatan Ibrahimovic (Paris SG) was quite harsh and Sebastien Moreira didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.
Edinson Cavani nearly gets in a one-on-one with the goalkeeper after a defence-splitting pass from Zlatan Ibrahimovic (Paris SG), but one of the defenders makes a clearance to snuff out the chance.
There will be nothing more to see in the first half. The whistle blowing of Sebastien Moreira has ended it.
Everything is set for the start of the second half.
Fantastic team goal! Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) was set free in the area by Zlatan Ibrahimovic and made no mistake with a lovely finish into the top right corner. 3:0.

Unbelievable! Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) wastes a huge scoring opportunity! He finds himself unmarked right in front of goal and fires in a first-time shot. Jonas Lossl pulls off one of the best saves of his career and stops the effort from hitting the net.
Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) is furious with himself as he misses a clear opportunity from the six-yard box. He sends a rebound a few inches wide of the left post.
It must be a yellow card. It is. Younousse Sankhare (Guingamp) receives the caution after an awful tackle.
Goal! Zlatan Ibrahimovic puts the ball on the head of Maxwell (Paris SG), who has the easy task to score into an empty net. 4:0.
The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and Thibault Giresse trots off the pitch and is replaced by Mustapha Diallo (Guingamp).

Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) blows a big chance to score! He slammed the ball from deep inside the box towards the net, but his aim was off and it went narrowly over the crossbar. The ball is off of the pitch and it's a goal kick for Guingamp.
It is time for a substitution. Lucas (Paris SG) is on for Yohan Cabaye.
Marco Verratti floats a lovely ball in from the free kick. Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) gathers the ball and strikes it into the bottom right corner, increasing the score to 5:0.
Here is a change. Christophe Mandanne is going off and Jocelyn Gourvennec gives the last tactical orders to Yannis Salibur (Guingamp).

Zlatan Ibrahimovic (Paris SG) takes the resulting free kick from 31 metres out. He attempts to send his effort into the bottom right corner, but Jonas Lossl is alert and keeps the ball out. The ball is out of play and Paris SG manage to earn a corner.

Zlatan Ibrahimovic (Paris SG) is strong enough to get to the ball and produces a header from close range. Even though it was aimed precisely towards the middle of the goal, Jonas Lossl didn't have a hard time stopping the attempt as it wasn't powerful enough.
The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and Adrien Rabiot (Paris SG) replaces Blaise Matuidi.
Laurent Blanc has decided to make a change. Ezequiel Lavezzi (Paris SG) replaces Javier Pastore.
Lucas (Paris SG) escapes his marker to meet a cross and heads to the middle of the goal, but the keeper pulls off an excellent reflex save to deny him.
The referee allows time for a substitution. Sylvain Marveaux will be replaced by Julien Cardy (Guingamp).
Jeremy Sorbon (Guingamp) pulls the jersey of one of the opposition players and Sebastien Moreira blows his whistle for a foul. PENALTY! Wonderful opportunity to score for Paris SG.
Zlatan Ibrahimovic (Paris SG) is heading towards the penalty spot to take it.
Zlatan Ibrahimovic (Paris SG) steps up and confidently directs the penalty into the left side of the goal!
The whistle is blown for an infringement and Reynald Lemaitre (Guingamp) receives a yellow card!
Sebastien Moreira is looking at his watch and immediately ends this match.
Here we go, today's match is starting right now.
Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) collects a precise pass inside the penalty area, keeps his cool, then drills the ball beyond the goalkeeper and into the bottom left corner off the woodwork.

Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) connected with a pass around the edge of the box, aimed and shot. His attempt went towards the bottom right corner, but Remy Riou was alert and the score remained the same. The referee blows his whistle, Paris SG are awarded a corner kick.
Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) latches on to a precise pass and one-on-one with the keeper slams the ball towards the left-hand post. Remy Riou is alert, though, and leaps like a salmon to deny him.
Serge Gakpe (Nantes) escapes his marker to connect with a cross and heads towards the top of the net, but the keeper pulls off an excellent save to deny him.

Javier Pastore (Paris SG) receives a precise pass and is given time inside the box to send a low strike towards the middle of the goal. Remy Riou guesses his intention and denies him with a fine save.
Papy Djilobodji (Nantes) will have to be careful for the rest of the match as he is shown a yellow card.

Zlatan Ibrahimovic passes to Blaise Matuidi (Paris SG) who collects the ball and unleashes a shot from the edge of the box. His effort goes into the middle of the net and past the surprised goalkeeper. The score is 0:2.
Marco Verratti (Paris SG) has tested the patience of referee Ruddy Buquet and goes into the book for a previous late challenge.
Nicolas Douchez pulls off a fantastic save! Alejandro Bedoya (Nantes) attempts to head home after a precise cross into the box. He aims his header towards the left post, but the effort is kept out.
Ruddy Buquet has ended the first half by blowing the whistle.
Ruddy Buquet blows his whistle and the second half starts.
This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Lucas Deaux (Nantes) was quite harsh and Ruddy Buquet didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.
The manager makes a subsitution with Adrien Rabiot (Paris SG) coming on for Blaise Matuidi.
Vincent Bessat (Nantes) is shown a yellow card by the referee for making a challenge on his opponent, but he looks angry with the decision.
Maxwell (Paris SG) sees a yellow card. He should be more careful because one more challenge like that could result in a red card. Nantes have an opportunity from a mid-range free kick.
The referee allows time for a substitution. Marco Verratti will be replaced by Yohan Cabaye (Paris SG).
Here is a change. Johan Audel is going off and Michel Der Zakarian gives the last tactical orders to Georges-Kevin N'Koudou (Nantes).
Thiago Motta (Paris SG) is literally asking for a yellow card with his behaviour. The referee agrees and books him.
Issa Cissokho (Nantes) gets booked for the first time in this match. The referee blows his whistle, a clear handball by Issa Cissokho (Nantes).
Here's the change. Javier Pastore leaves the pitch and Ezequiel Lavezzi (Paris SG) comes on as a substitute.
Michel Der Zakarian has decided to make a change. Valentin Rongier (Nantes) replaces Lucas Deaux.
Michel Der Zakarian prepares a substitution. Serge Gakpe is replaced by Yacine Bammou (Nantes).
There will be no more action in this match as the referee signals full time.
The match has just started.
Ali Ahamada receives ovations from the crowd. He manages to block a first-time effort from Geoffrey Kondogbia (Monaco), whose strike from the edge of the box was headed towards the top right corner.
Goal! Yannick Carrasco plays it to Bernardo Silva (Monaco), whose deflected shot from inside the box goes past the helpless Ali Ahamada. 1:0.
Goal - 1:1! Oscar Trejo laid the ball off to Martin Braithwaite (Toulouse), who shot from close range low into the back of the net, leaving the goalkeeper helpless.
Martin Braithwaite (Toulouse) makes a yard for himself and unleashes a stunning shot from 25 metres out. His great effort, however, goes painfully wide of the left post.
Geoffrey Kondogbia (Monaco) attempts to discuss the decision with Nicolas Rainville, but he soon realises that it's not the right thing to do as he sees the yellow.
Andrea Raggi (Monaco) has too much to say to the referee and receives a yellow card.
Oscar Trejo (Toulouse) clearly holds his opponent to prevent him from getting the ball and the referee blows his whistle for a foul. Penalty awarded! Monaco will take a penalty kick.
Anthony Martial (Monaco) is going to take the penalty!
Anthony Martial (Monaco) sends Ali Ahamada the wrong way and fires the penalty into the middle of the goal!
The end of the first half.
The half-time break is over and the second half is about to start.

It's a goal! Joao Moutinho (Monaco) makes it 2:1. He jumped highest to connect with a perfect cross from Andrea Raggi and planted his close-range header into the middle of the goal. Ali Ahamada was helpless.
Wissam Ben Yedder (Toulouse) shoots at goal from the free kick from some 27 metres out. His attempt was quite precise and another few inches and it would have ended up inside the right post.
The substitution is prepared. Nabil Dirar (Monaco) joins the action as a substitute, replacing Yannick Carrasco.
There's no point in Jean-Armel Kana-Biyik (Toulouse) arguing about the referee's decision as it's an obvious red card for a dangerous tackle.
The referee goes straight to his pocket and shows Nabil Dirar (Monaco) a red card. No point in arguing. He has to leave the pitch.
It is time for a substitution. Aleksandar Pesic (Toulouse) is on for Wissam Ben Yedder.
That's the end of the game for Martin Braithwaite, who is replaced by Adrien Regattin (Toulouse).
Oscar Trejo goes off the pitch and Dragos Grigore (Toulouse) comes on.
Tiemoue Bakayoko (Monaco) joins the action as a substitute, replacing Geoffrey Kondogbia.
Leonardo Jardim has decided to make a change. Valere Germain (Monaco) replaces Anthony Martial.
Goal! Joao Moutinho displays great vision and sends a pass to Valere Germain (Monaco), who shows brilliant composure inside the box to bury the ball into the back of the net. The score is 4:1.
The referee blows for the end of today's match.
Here we go, today's match is starting right now.
The free kick from a promising distance is taken by Clement Grenier (Lyon), who fires in a direct effort inches over the crossbar. What a chance!

Anthony Lopes makes a brilliant save! Adrien Thomasson (Evian TG) easily weaves through the defence and unleashes a shot from just outside of the box. His effort goes towards the left side of the goal but is saved by the keeper!
Benjamin Leroy pulls off a great save to deny Clinton N'Jie (Lyon) who, makes himself some space inside the box and unleashes a quick low drive towards the middle of the goal. Lyon earn a corner.

Clement Grenier (Lyon) struck with a perfectly taken free kick from the edge of the box. He curled the ball straight inside the right post. There are not enough superlatives that can be used to describe that goal.

Clement Grenier sprays a wonderful pass out to Alexandre Lacazette (Lyon), who cannot get enough power or direction to cause Benjamin Leroy problems and the goalkeeper is able to watch the ball go just wide of the left post.

Clinton N'Jie (Lyon) receives a low pass just outside the box and unleashes a fine strike towards the right post. Benjamin Leroy pulls off a reflexive save to block his effort. Nice goalkeeping skill, indeed.
Dangerous play by Dany Nounkeu (Evian TG). Benoit Bastien blows his whistle for a foul. The referee points to the penalty spot. PENALTY to Lyon!
The referee demonstrates he won't tolerate this behaviour. Dany Nounkeu (Evian TG) is given a yellow card.
Alexandre Lacazette (Lyon) is heading towards the penalty spot to take it.
Alexandre Lacazette (Lyon) converts the spot kick with a blast into the roof of the net.
The first half of today's match has just finished.
The game restarts for the second half.
Half-time substitution. Youssouf Sabaly is replaced by Alioune Fall (Evian TG).

Maxime Gonalons (Lyon) was the quickest one to orientate himself inside the box and rose high to reach a fine corner kick. He fails to direct the ball past the goalkeeper as it flies narrowly over the bar.
Gooal! No wait, it's been ruled out for offside. Clinton N'Jie (Lyon) disagrees, but the linesman is sure about his call.
A substitution has been made. Mathieu Duhamel goes off and Nicolas Blandi (Evian TG) comes on.
Clinton N'Jie just cannot continue due to injury and has to be substituted. Jordan Ferri (Lyon) replaces him.
Alioune Fall swings the cross over. Gilles Sunu (Evian TG) gets his head to it but it goes just over the crossbar.
Maxime Gonalons (Lyon) picks up a yellow card for a foul.
Substitution. Gilles Sunu makes his way off the pitch and Djakaridja Kone (Evian TG) comes on as his replacement.
Lovely cross from Adrien Thomasson to find Clarck N'Sikulu (Evian TG) deep in the box, but he steers his header well wide of the right post.
Nabil Fekir (Lyon) takes a mid-range free kick, but Benjamin Leroy stops the ball from reaching the top right corner by tipping it onto the post. Great save!
Alexandre Lacazette will be replaced by Mohamed Yattara (Lyon).

A neat pass is well received by Nicolas Blandi (Evian TG), who is lurking on the edge of the box and produces a low drive directed towards the middle of the goal. The goalkeeper makes a decent save to block his shot.
Nabil Fekir (Lyon) collects a pass inside the box and unleashes a shot which is brilliantly blocked by a defender. Now Lyon have a corner.
The game has come to an end for Maxime Gonalons. He has contributed as much as he could today. He will be replaced by the fresh legs of Steed Malbranque (Lyon).
Steed Malbranque (Lyon) got the ball in the six-yard box and produced a projectile, but one of his teammates was standing in the wrong place and the ball glanced off him away.
Nabil Fekir (Lyon) misses a good chance to score. An inch-perfect cross into the box finds Nabil Fekir (Lyon) who rises for a header, but sends the ball well over the bar.
Benoit Bastien is looking at his watch and immediately ends this match.
The first half of this match is about to start.
Steve Mandanda receives ovations from the crowd. He manages to block a first-time effort from Kevin Lejeune (Metz), whose strike from the edge of the box was headed towards the middle of the goal.

Giannelli Imbula (Marseille) gets on the end of a pass and takes a low shot from the edge of the box which is straight at Anthony Mfa Mezui, who makes a comfortable save. The ball is out of play. Marseille win a corner kick.
Goal! Andre-Pierre Gignac (Marseille) fires the rebound into the bottom right corner after the ball breaks to him in the box. The score is 0:1.
Florent Malouda (Metz) argues strongly with the referee and is awarded a yellow card. A needless yellow card!
Close! Kevin Lejeune (Metz) stands over the resulting free kick from around 24 metres out and his shot goes just over the crossbar.
That is it for the first half after the referee blows his whistle and the players head to their respective dressing rooms.
The second half has just started.
Anthony Mfa Mezui pulls off a great save to deny Andre Ayew (Marseille) who, makes himself some space inside the box and unleashes a quick low drive towards the middle of the goal.
What was Mario Lemina (Marseille) thinking? He will not get away with that. The referee shows him a yellow card.
Andre-Pierre Gignac (Marseille) is cautioned by the referee for a foul that he committed a little earlier.
Andre Ayew (Marseille) picked up a yellow card for saying too much to the referee.
The manager has decided to make a substitution and Ferjani Sassi walks off the pitch to be replaced by Fakhreddine Ben Youssef (Metz).
GOAL! Andre-Pierre Gignac (Marseille) collects a pass and from inside the box he lifts the ball over Anthony Mfa Mezui, who was off his line. What a finish that is! 0:2.
Benjamin Mendy (Marseille) takes the ball, nicely zig-zags through the defence, but his low drive to the left post is smartly dealt with by Anthony Mfa Mezui.
Substitution. Gaetan Bussmann is replaced by Yeni Atito N'Gbakoto (Metz).
Albert Cartier has decided to substitute Ahmed Kashi and he is replaced by Janis Ikaunieks (Metz).
Substitution. Dimitri Payet walks off the pitch and Baptiste Aloe (Marseille) comes on as a substitute.

Andre Ayew (Marseille) receives a precise pass and is given time inside the box to send a low strike towards the middle of the goal. Anthony Mfa Mezui guesses his intention and denies him with a fine save.
That's it for today, Benoit Millot has blown his whistle and the game is over.
The first half has started.
Goal - 1:0! Marco Verratti (Paris SG) tries his luck from the edge of the box and scores with an accurate shot inside the left post. Javier Pastore provided an assist for the goal.
Ferjani Sassi (Metz) is booked for saying more than Mikael Lesage was willing to tolerate.
Goal! Javier Pastore gets to the ball, slips Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) into the area and he scores with a delightful chipped finish to make it 2:0.
There will be nothing more to see in the first half. The whistle blowing of Mikael Lesage has ended it.
The players are back out on the pitch following the half-time break and the second half is about to start.

Goal! Bouna Sarr clips a neat ball into the box in the direction of Modibo Maiga (Metz), who jumps highest and steers a bullet header from the centre of the box into the left side of the goal. Nicolas Douchez had no chance of stopping that. 2:1.

Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) must feel embarrassed now. He received a killer pass, but his shot from the six-yard box was a disaster. He miskicked and made it very easy for Anthony Mfa Mezui to get hold of the ball. Paris SG will have a chance to score from a corner kick.
Guido Milan is being substituted because of an injury. Albert Cartier sends Jeremy Choplin (Metz) on the pitch.

Florent Malouda (Metz) receives a precise pass and is given time inside the box to send a low strike towards the middle of the goal. Nicolas Douchez guesses his intention and denies him with a fine save.

Substitution. Yeni Atito N'Gbakoto makes way for Fakhreddine Ben Youssef (Metz).
Laurent Blanc has decided to make a change. Adrien Rabiot (Paris SG) replaces Thiago Motta.
The referee signals that it is time for a substitution and Cheick Doukoure (Metz) is coming onto the pitch as Ferjani Sassi cannot continue after picking up an injury.
It is time for a substitution. Lucas (Paris SG) is on for Ezequiel Lavezzi.

Javier Pastore produces a sweet pass and picks out Gregory van der Wiel (Paris SG) inside the box. He quickly takes a shot which goes into the middle of the net and leaves the goalkeeper helpless. He makes it 2:1!
Lucas (Paris SG) came close to scoring. He connected with a pass inside the box and perhaps should have done better than direct his shot straight at Anthony Mfa Mezui.
Blaise Matuidi will be replaced by Marquinhos (Paris SG).
Mikael Lesage is looking at his watch and immediately ends this match.
The first half has started.
Goal! The corner is whipped in and Corentin Tolisso (Lyon) is in the right place at the right time, planting his header into the middle of the goal. He makes it 0:.
Goal!  puts a cross into the box and finds Alexandre Lacazette (Lyon), who latches on to it and strikes the ball low into the middle of the net. He makes it 0:2.

Alexandre Lacazette (Lyon) receives a precise pass and is given time inside the box to send a low strike towards the middle of the goal. Kossi Agassa guesses his intention and denies him with a fine save.
Corentin Tolisso (Lyon) picks up a pass inside the box and finds some space for a shot before unleashing a low drive goalwards, but one of the defending players blocks his effort.
GOAL 1:2! Alexis Peuget (Reims) unleashes a shot from distance, which is deflected past Anthony Lopes. He had no chance of stopping it as the ball rapidly changed its direction.
What a great effort! Prince Oniangue (Reims) decides to unleash a long-range shot. Despite hitting it very well, it scorches inches wide of the right post. We could have witnessed a magnificent goal.
Clinton N'Jie (Lyon) meets a perfect cross from Henri Bedimo deep inside the box and controls it with a nice first touch. He produces an accurate strike into the top right corner. It's 1:3.
Diego (Reims) misses a big chance! He fires the ball high over the crossbar from inside the 6-yard box after the ball rebounded to him.
Nabil Fekir (Lyon) goes on a mazy run through the defence and gets within shooting range inside the box, but his low effort to the middle of the target is thwarted by Kossi Agassa.
The end of the first half.
The second half has just started.
A cross arrives in the goalmouth from the resulting corner kick. Antoine Devaux (Reims) outjumps the defence, but his promising header bounces away off the bar!
Alexandre Lacazette (Lyon) takes his opponent down and receives a yellow card from the referee. Reims have been awarded a free kick.
It is time for a substitution. Jordan Ferri (Lyon) is on for Clement Grenier.

Post! Antoine Devaux (Reims) had a good opportunity when he latched on to a cross from the wing, but his header from the centre of the box wasn't accurate enough and the ball crashed against the right post!
Olivier Guegan has decided to make a change. Nicolas De Preville (Reims) replaces Odair Fortes.
What was Christophe Jallet (Lyon) thinking? He will not get away with that. The referee shows him a yellow card. That's a free kick to Reims.
Fredy Fautrel shows a yellow card to Nabil Fekir (Lyon) for a tough tackle. A free kick is awarded to Reims.

Kossi Agassa (Reims) pulls off a great save to deny  after receiving a precise defence-splitting pass. The effort is headed for the underside of the crossbar, but the goalkeeper dives superbly to stop it. Definitely the best save of this match so far!
That's the end of the game for Benjamin Moukandjo, who is replaced by David N'Gog (Reims).
Here is a change. Nabil Fekir is going off and Hubert Fournier gives the last tactical orders to Steed Malbranque (Lyon).
Alexis Peuget (Reims) receives a yellow card from the referee for a foul that he committed a little earlier.
The manager has decided to make a substitution and  walks off the pitch to be replaced by Mohamed Yattara (Lyon).
Olivier Guegan has decided to substitute Alexis Peuget and he is replaced by Gaetan Charbonnier (Reims).

Mohamed Yattara (Lyon) runs with the ball towards the keeper and pulls the trigger from close range, but Kossi Agassa anticipates his intention and makes an amazing save to stop the shot going low into the middle of the target.
This is definitely not what MickaÃ«l Tacalfred (Reims) wanted. Attempting to intercept an offensive pass, he scored an own goal and made it 1:4.

Anthony Lopes can hear the fans clapping for his superb goalkeeping after he magnificently stopped the close-range effort from David N'Gog (Reims). The ball would have probably ended up in the bottom right corner. Reims win a corner.
Goal! Diego launched the corner kick and superbly found the head of Gaetan Charbonnier (Reims), whose accurate effort from near the penalty spot went into the top right corner. It's 2:4.
There will be no more action in this match as the referee signals full time.
Here we go, today's match is starting right now.
The foul by Jerome Le Moigne (Lens) is worthy of a card and a yellow is duly shown by Bartolomeu Varela.
Bartolomeu Varela shows the yellow card to Fabinho (Monaco) for a heavy challenge.
OFF THE BAR! Yannick Carrasco (Monaco) produces a thunderbolt of a strike from distance, but his effort rattles the crossbar!
Pablo Chavarria (Lens) does well to meet a cross from Yoann Touzghar, but he directs his shot just wide of the right post.
After a goalmouth scramble the ball rebounds out to Yannick Carrasco (Monaco) who buries it from close range into the roof of the net.
Anthony Martial (Monaco) receives a killer pass, finds himself one-on-one with the goalkeeper and sends a low drive past the goalkeeper.
The first half of today's match has just finished.
The referee blows his whistle to signal the start of the second half.
Antoine Kombouare makes a switch. Aristote Madiani (Lens) is coming on in place of Benjamin Boulenger at the start of the second period.
Antoine Kombouare makes a half-time substitution. Alharbi El Jadeyaoui (Lens) comes on in place of Jerome Le Moigne.
Bartolomeu Varela shows a yellow card to Pierrick Valdivia (Lens) for a tough tackle.
Bartolomeu Varela shows a yellow card to Alharbi El Jadeyaoui (Lens), who isn't surprised as the tackle was really hard and late.
Goal! Bernardo Silva (Monaco) is quickest to react to the rebound and stabs the ball into the back of the net. It's 0:3.
The substitution has been made. Nabil Dirar (Monaco) has replaced Bernardo Silva.
Antoine Kombouare has decided to substitute Wylan Cyprien and he is replaced by Quentin Lecoeuche (Lens).
Leonardo Jardim has decided to introduce fresh legs, with Dimitar Berbatov (Monaco) replacing Anthony Martial.
The manager makes a subsitution with Matheus Carvalho (Monaco) coming on for .
That's it for today, Bartolomeu Varela has blown his whistle and the game is over.
The first half has just begun.
Maxwell (Paris SG) scores as he latches on to a pass inside the penalty box and fires a perfect low shot that goes into the middle of the goal and past the goalkeeper.
Goal! Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) picks up a pass and gets to the edge of the box before clipping a brilliant lob over the goalkeeper and into the empty net. He makes it 2:0.
Clement Turpin shows a yellow card to Simon Kjaer (Lille) for a tough tackle.
Goal! Edinson Cavani provides Ezequiel Lavezzi (Paris SG) with a nice pass inside the box. It allows him to finish with a precise effort under the bar. 3:0.
Salvatore Sirigu is being substituted because of an injury. Laurent Blanc sends Nicolas Douchez (Paris SG) on the pitch.
Problems for Laurent Blanc as Serge Aurier is not able to play anymore. His injury is too serious and Gregory van der Wiel (Paris SG) replaces him.
It's in the back of the net! Blaise Matuidi is the provider as he slips the ball to Ezequiel Lavezzi (Paris SG) who simply steers it home from close range. It's 4:0.
The foul by Sebastien Corchia (Lille) is worthy of a card and a yellow is duly shown by Clement Turpin.
The first half of today's match has just finished.
The second half gets underway.
Half-time substitution. Rio Mavuba is replaced by Adama Traore (Lille).
Rene Girard has made a change at the break. Divock Origi (Lille) has come on in place of Rony Lopes.
Sofiane Boufal sends in a great cross from the corner and finds Marko Basa (Lille), who outjumps the defence to finish into the top left corner with a header. The score is 4:1.
Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) receives a well-played pass inside the penalty area and shoots. He sends the ball into orbit.
It is time for a substitution. Adrien Rabiot (Paris SG) is on for Thiago Motta.
Sebastien Corchia (Lille) holds his opponent to prevent him from getting the ball and the referee blows for a foul after seeing the whole situation. Paris SG are awarded a penalty kick!
The referee blows his whistle and raises a red card. Sebastien Corchia (Lille) is the one who has to leave the pitch immediately.
Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) is going to take the penalty!
Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) leaves the keeper helpless with his precise penalty shot inside the right post.
The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and Nolan Roux departs the field of play to be replaced by Benjamin Pavard (Lille).
Gregory van der Wiel (Paris SG) has received a yellow card for his foul.

An amazing individual effort from Ezequiel Lavezzi (Paris SG) ends with a strike from inside the penalty area. He sends the ball precisely into the bottom left corner and makes it 6:1. Vincent Enyeama was helpless.
Vincent Enyeama pulls off a great save to deny Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) who, makes himself some space inside the box and unleashes a quick low drive towards the middle of the goal.
Clement Turpin has issued a yellow card to Idrissa Gueye (Lille).
The referee checks his watch and blows his whistle to signal the end of this match.
Today's match has just started, enjoy the game!

Nice piece of skill by Jordan Ayew (Lorient) as he collected a pass and fired an unstoppable thunderbolt goalwards, leaving the goalkeeper stranded. The shot went straight into the bottom right corner.
Goal! Jordan Ayew finds Francois Bellugou (Lorient) with a headed pass and the latter glances a header past the goalkeeper to make it 0:2.
The referee signals a substitution. Jacques-Alaixys Romao (Marseille) is brought on as a substitute for Brice Dja Djedje.
Jacques-Alaixys Romao (Marseille) can't expect anything else than a yellow card for his hard tackle. And a yellow it is. Said Ennjimi didn't think twice about pulling it out of his pocket.

Andre-Pierre Gignac (Marseille) blows a huge opportunity! He latches on to a perfect cross from the wing into the penalty area, but sends his bullet header just wide of the right post. The ball is off of the pitch and it's a goal kick for Lorient.
The referee blows his whistle to end the first half and the players are now heading to their respective dressing rooms.
The players are back out on the pitch following the half-time break and the second half is about to start.
Marcelo Bielsa makes a half-time substitution. Lucas Ocampos (Marseille) comes on in place of Florian Thauvin.
Said Ennjimi shows the yellow card to Didier Ndong (Lorient) for a heavy challenge.
Dimitri Payet (Marseille) tried his luck from a long-range free kick, but the effort came back off the right post!
Goal 1:2! Andre Ayew (Marseille) taps home from close range after the rebound fell kindly into his path.
Today's referee Said Ennjimi rightly decides to book Mehdi Mostefa (Lorient) for his harsh tackle.
Rafidine Abdullah (Lorient) joins the action as a substitute, replacing Walid Mesloub.

Goal! Jeremy Morel (Marseille) peels away from his marker to meet the resulting free kick from Dimitri Payet, and he steers a powerful header from near the penalty spot inside the left post. What a finish that is - 2:2!

Goal! Romain Philippoteaux (Lorient) weaves his way past opponents, and he unleashes a magnificent effort from the edge of the box into the bottom left corner. Steve Mandanda had no chance of reaching it. The score is 2:3.
Marcelo Bielsa has decided to make a change. Michy Batshuayi (Marseille) replaces Mario Lemina.
We are about to witness a subsitution. Maxime Barthelme (Lorient) for Romain Philippoteaux.
Said Ennjimi shows a yellow card to Rafidine Abdullah (Lorient), who isn't surprised as the tackle was really hard and late.
Michy Batshuayi (Marseille) leaps to connect with a lovely cross and scores with a header that bounces off the ground and goes inside the right post. The goalkeeper had no chance to make a save.
The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and Mathias Autret (Lorient) comes onto the pitch for Yann Jouffre.
Jordan Ayew (Lorient) collects a sweet pass and lashes the ball under the crossbar. Glorious strike.
Goal! Mathias Autret (Lorient) fires the rebound inside the right post after the ball breaks to him in the box. The score is 3:5.
Jordan Ayew (Lorient) is penalised.
A yellow-coloured card is received by Lamine Gassama (Lorient).
Nothing more will happen in this game as the referee blows for full time.
The first half of this match is about to start.
Said Ennjimi shows a yellow card to Corentin Tolisso (Lyon) for his blatant foul.
Mevlut Erdinc (St Etienne) is booked after bringing down an opponent. Said Ennjimi had an easy-decision to make.

What a great touch by Nabil Fekir (Lyon)! He picks up a precise pass inside the box and immediately produces a shot towards the net. Unfortunately for him, his bullet only crashes against the crossbar.
Goal Clinton N'Jie (Lyon)! Clinton N'Jie (Lyon) was put through by Nabil Fekir and he showed brilliant composure inside the box to fire into the bottom right corner. 1:0.
Christophe Galtier has decided to substitute Paul Baysse and he is replaced by Romain Hamouma (St Etienne).
Lindsay Rose (Lyon) touches the ball with his hand. PENALTY! A huge scoring opportunity for St Etienne.

Salvatore Sirigu gets a well deserved ovation! Diego Contento (Bordeaux) produces a decent first-time strike towards the roof of the net, but the goalkeeper is positioned well to block it. Nice goalkeeping skills. Bordeaux force a corner. Their opponents will face another attacking threat.

Salvatore Sirigu makes a brilliant save! Isaac Kiese Thelin (Bordeaux) easily weaves through the defence and fires the ball from mid-range. His effort goes towards the bottom left corner but is saved by the keeper!

A perfectly taken corner kick. Lamine Ludovic Sane (Bordeaux) gets on the end of it and produces a fantastic bullet header from around the penalty spot into the bottom left corner, increasing the score of today's match â 0:0.
Zlatan Ibrahimovic (Paris SG) gets on the end of a pass and produces a promising first-time shot at goal. His effort is blocked by Cedric Carrasso with a brilliant diving save!
Laurent Blanc is forced to make a change. David Luiz is not able to carry on due to injury. He is replaced by Zoumana Camara (Paris SG).
Thiago Motta (Paris SG) says more than he should have to the referee and is shown a yellow card.
The foul by Marco Verratti (Paris SG) is worthy of a card and a yellow is duly shown by Lionel Jaffredo.
The first half of today's match has just finished.
The players are back out on the pitch following the half-time break and the second half is about to start.
Lionel Jaffredo shows the yellow card to Diego Contento (Bordeaux) for a heavy challenge.

GOAL! A terrible mistake leads to a goal. The defender ends up losing possession, allowing Zlatan Ibrahimovic (Paris SG) to pick up the ball before slotting it into the back of the net to make it 1:1.
Clement Chantome (Bordeaux) goes for goal but he directs his effort just wide of the left post.
The referee signals that it is time for a substitution and Yohan Cabaye (Paris SG) will replace Thiago Motta.
Gregory van der Wiel (Paris SG) can't expect anything else than a yellow card for his hard tackle. And a yellow it is. Lionel Jaffredo didn't think twice about pulling it out of his pocket.
Jaroslav Plasil (Bordeaux) gets on the end of a pass and produces a promising first-time shot towards the top of the net. His effort is blocked by Salvatore Sirigu with a brilliant diving save!
GOAL! Wahbi Khazri (Bordeaux) scores with a header from close range after Isaac Kiese Thelin headed a pin-point lofted cross into his path. It's 2:1.
Ezequiel Lavezzi (Paris SG) fails to turn the rebound in as the goalkeeper pulls off a great save to keep him out.
Substitution. Yohan Cabaye leaves the pitch and is replaced by Edinson Cavani (Paris SG).
Willy Sagnol has decided to make a change. Nicolas Maurice-Belay (Bordeaux) replaces Wahbi Khazri.
This would have been a magnificent goal from Diego Contento (Bordeaux), who collected the ball inside the box and prodded a first-time shot on goal that flew just narrowly wide of the right post.
Mariano (Bordeaux) brings his opponent down. Lionel Jaffredo has a clear sight of it and blows his whistle for a foul. That's a penalty to Paris SG! They have a good chance to score now.
The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and Isaac Kiese Thelin departs the field of play to be replaced by Enzo Crivelli (Bordeaux).
Mariano (Bordeaux) gets a yellow card.
Zlatan Ibrahimovic (Paris SG) will take the responsibility and he is already preparing the ball.
Goal! Zlatan Ibrahimovic (Paris SG) slams home the penalty with a precise low shot into the bottom left corner.
Goal! Diego Rolan (Bordeaux) finds some space inside the box to meet a beautiful cross and fires the ball inside the back of the net.
It will be a substitution. Abdou Traore (Bordeaux) is ready to enter the pitch as Diego Rolan walks off.
The match has just finished.
Today's match has just started, enjoy the game!
Danijel Subasic pulls off a great save to deny Edinson Cavani (Paris SG), who makes himself some space inside the box and unleashes a quick shot towards the middle of the goal.
Ezequiel Lavezzi (Paris SG) makes a yard for himself inside the box after an accurate pass and takes a shot that goes just wide of the right post.
Ezequiel Lavezzi (Paris SG) receives a precise pass inside the box and takes a shot that flies just wide of the right post.
That is it for the first half after the referee blows his whistle and the players head to their respective dressing rooms.
Everything is set for the start of the second half.
Javier Pastore (Paris SG) gets on the end of a pass and produces a promising first-time shot at goal. His effort is blocked by Danijel Subasic with a brilliant diving save!

Blaise Matuidi (Paris SG) is furious with himself as he misses a golden opportunity from inside the six-yard box. He sends a rebound a few inches wide of the left post. The ball is off of the pitch and it's a goal kick for Monaco.
Substitution. Nabil Dirar (Monaco) receives a signal from the referee and is now allowed to enter the pitch as Almamy Toure walks off.
What a big chance! Javier Pastore (Paris SG) picks up an inch-perfect pass inside the box and fires the ball a whisker wide of the right post.
Dimitar Berbatov (Monaco) joins the action as a substitute, replacing Anthony Martial.
Gregory van der Wiel (Paris SG) sees a yellow card from Bartolomeu Varela after he sent one of the opposing players to the ground.
We are about to witness a substitution. Adrien Rabiot (Paris SG) is replacing Blaise Matuidi.
Laurent Blanc has decided to substitute Ezequiel Lavezzi and he is replaced by Jean-Christophe Bahebeck (Paris SG).
Today's match ends for Yannick Carrasco who will be replaced by Matheus Carvalho (Monaco).
The referee demonstrates he won't tolerate this behaviour. David Luiz (Paris SG) is given a yellow card.
Danijel Subasic (Monaco) is yellow-carded.
The referee checks his watch and blows his whistle to signal the end of this match.
Here we go, today's match is starting right now.

Ricky van Wolfswinkel (St Etienne) shows good awareness deep inside the box as he latches on to a cross from the resulting free kick. He jumps high but his towering header lacks a little bit of accuracy and flies inches wide of the right-hand post. The ball goes out of play and Marseille will have a goal kick.

Max Gradel (St Etienne) probably spotted the goalkeeper off his line, but his long-range effort flew just a few inches wide of the left post. The ball is off of the pitch and it's a goal kick for Marseille.
Romain Hamouma (St Etienne) sends over a cross from the side into the penalty area in order to find one of his teammates, but he fails and the opportunity goes begging.
Max Gradel (St Etienne) goes on a solo run, but he fails to create a chance as an opposition player blocks him.
Dimitri Payet (Marseille) has a sight of goal and shoots from long range but his ambitious effort flies just over the bar. The ball goes out of play and St Etienne will have a goal kick.
Lucas Ocampos (Marseille) finds enough space to climb high and plants a header well wide of the right post. What a poor effort.
Stephane Ruffier blocks a long-range effort from Giannelli Imbula (Marseille) towards the middle of the goal.
Max Gradel (St Etienne) sends in a direct shot from a dangerously positioned free kick. The ball sails towards the left post, but the goalkeeper prevents a goal with a quick save.
The referee blows his whistle to end the first half and the players are now heading to their respective dressing rooms.
The players are back out on the pitch following the half-time break and the second half is about to start.
Brice Dja Djedje (Marseille) is booked after bringing down an opponent. Clement Turpin had an easy-decision to make.
Kevin Theophile-Catherine (St Etienne) gets in a header from the resulting free kick. It lacks accuracy, however, to bother the keeper and the ball goes a few metres wide of the right post.

Clement Turpin blows his whistle after Jeremy Morel (Marseille) brings one of his opponents down with a strong tackle. The crowd is going crazy! The referee makes a call and gives the penalty to St Etienne.
Max Gradel (St Etienne) scores from the penalty spot with a shot that goes inside the right post. How easy is that!

A great solo effort from Franck Tabanou (St Etienne) and he attempts to surprise the goalkeeper with a long-range shot towards the bottom right corner. Steve Mandanda has a clear view of it and makes a comfortable save.
Andre Ayew (Marseille) slips past one challenge, but is unable to feed a low pass into the path of one of his teammates.
The expression of the referee Clement Turpin is crystal clear. This behaviour won't be tolerated. Lucas Ocampos (Marseille) is shown a yellow card.
Marcelo Bielsa has decided to make a change. Michy Batshuayi (Marseille) replaces Andre-Pierre Gignac.
Romain Alessandrini (Marseille) joins the action as a substitute, replacing Jacques-Alaixys Romao.
The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and Baptiste Aloe (Marseille) replaces Brice Dja Djedje.

Michy Batshuayi (Marseille) finishes his beautiful individual effort with a superb strike from inside the box. Stephane Ruffier is just a bystander as the ball flies low into the middle of the goal. The score is 1:1.
Baptiste Aloe (Marseille) is punished with the yellow card.

It's in the back of the net! Romain Alessandrini slips the ball through to Michy Batshuayi (Marseille), and he darts into the box to unleash a magnificent low shot into the back of the net. He makes it 1:2.

Romain Alessandrini (Marseille) gets in a header from the resulting free kick. It lacks accuracy, however, to bother the keeper and the ball goes a few metres over the bar. The ball is off of the pitch and it's a goal kick for St Etienne.
We are about to witness a subsitution. Yohan Mollo (St Etienne) for Ismael Diomande.
Romain Hamouma (St Etienne) makes a good run with the ball into the box, but mishits his shot as it goes high over the bar. The ball is off of the pitch and it's a goal kick for Marseille.
Christophe Galtier decides to make a substitution. Ricky van Wolfswinkel will be replaced by Mevlut Erdinc (St Etienne).

Dimitri Payet (Marseille) is unable to feed a through ball into the path of his teammates. Dimitri Payet (Marseille) covers his face with his hands after wasting a promising chance. He takes the rebound on the edge of the box but blazes the ball high over the crossbar.
Rod Fanni (Marseille) sees a yellow! His tackle wasn't that harsh, but he probably talked himself into Clement Turpin's book.
Lucas Ocampos (Marseille) spurned a good chance! He gets a shot away from inside the penalty box, but it goes just over the bar. The ball is off of the pitch and it's a goal kick for St Etienne.
Substitution. Kevin Monnet-Paquet (St Etienne) receives a signal from the referee and is now allowed to enter the pitch as Romain Hamouma walks off.
Mevlut Erdinc (St Etienne) has a great chance inside the six-yard box, shoots low to the middle of the goal, but Steve Mandanda pulls off an exquisite save to deny him.
Kevin Theophile-Catherine (St Etienne) has an effort on goal, but he misses to the right of the goal. The ball is off of the pitch and it's a goal kick for Marseille.

Steve Mandanda makes a brilliant save! Yohan Mollo (St Etienne) easily weaves through the defence and fires the ball from mid-range. His effort goes towards the middle of the goal but is saved by the keeper!
Mevlut Erdinc (St Etienne) rises high to beat the goalkeeper with a perfect header. He heads the ball into the middle of the goal, bouncing in off the ground.
Yohan Mollo (St Etienne) picks up a yellow card for an infringement.
Romain Alessandrini (Marseille) flights in the cross, but the defender is alert and clears to safety.
Dimitri Payet (Marseille) passes the ball from the edge of the box in order to find his teammate, who is in a good scoring position, but the defender blocks the pass and spanks the ball to safety.
Clement Turpin is looking at his watch and immediately ends this match.
The referee blows his whistle and we are underway.

The assistant referee raises his flag and the referee blows his whistle. Zlatan Ibrahimovic (Paris SG) puts the ball into the net, but he is flagged for offside. Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) is caught offside!
What a shot! Corentin Tolisso (Lyon) decides to unleash a long-range missile of a shot, but his effort smashes against the left post.

Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) must feel embarrassed now. He received a killer pass, but his shot from the six-yard box was a disaster. He miskicked and made it very easy for Anthony Lopes to get hold of the ball. The referee and his assistant both point at the corner flag. Paris SG will have an opportunity to threaten the opposition's goal.

David Luiz (Paris SG) was the quickest one to orientate himself inside the box and leaps to connect with a cross from the corner kick. He produces a fine header, but it flies narrowly wide of the left post.
What a goal! Nabil Fekir plays it to Clinton N'Jie (Lyon), who finds himself unmarked inside the box and slots a first-time shot past Salvatore Sirigu into the right side of the goal. 1:0.
Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) is booked.
There will be nothing more to see in the first half. The whistle blowing of Clement Turpin has ended it.
The second half has just started.

Anthony Lopes pulls off a decent save! Zlatan Ibrahimovic (Paris SG) attempts to head home after a precise cross into the box. He aims his header towards the middle of the net, but the effort is kept out.
What a save from Anthony Lopes! Zlatan Ibrahimovic (Paris SG) jumps high to meet a cross and glances a promising header from close range, but the goalkeeper pulls off a brilliant stop to keep it out.
Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) came close to scoring. He connected with a pass inside the box and perhaps should have done better than direct his shot straight at Anthony Lopes.
Jordan Ferri will be replaced by Arnold Mvuemba (Lyon).
Clement Turpin blows his whistle after Lindsay Rose (Lyon) kicks an opponent's legs instead of the ball. Paris SG are about to take a penalty!
Nabil Fekir (Lyon) is cautioned by the referee after being shown a yellow card for dissent.
Henri Bedimo (Lyon) kept talking out of turn to the referee until Clement Turpin lost patience and pulled out a yellow card.
Zlatan Ibrahimovic (Paris SG) coolly converts the penalty, sending the ball into the top left corner.
Maxime Gonalons (Lyon) attempts to discuss the decision with Clement Turpin, but he soon realises that it's not the right thing to do as he sees the yellow.
Laurent Blanc prepares a substitution. Lucas is replaced by Ezequiel Lavezzi (Paris SG).
Laurent Blanc has decided to introduce fresh legs, with Yohan Cabaye (Paris SG) replacing Edinson Cavani.
Yohan Cabaye (Paris SG) picks up a yellow card for a foul.
Hubert Fournier has decided to make a change. Yassine Benzia (Lyon) replaces Clinton N'Jie.
The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and Rachid Ghezzal (Lyon) comes onto the pitch for Yoann Gourcuff.
Clement Turpin is looking at his watch and immediately ends this match.
